Key Match Events: Haaland came the width of the woodwork to score for Norway
Arnautovic scored the opening goal for Austria
Sorloth equalized for Norway but Austria scored again soon after
Baumgartner scored a penalty for Austria
Lienhart scored a header for Austria
Posch scored a header for Austria
Gregoritsch scored a goal for Austria
Pre-Game Insights: Martin Odegaard was absent for Norway
Ralf Rangnick's men showed more spark after the floodlights failed
Post-Match Reflections: Austria's win boosts their promotion hopes
Norway tasted defeat for the first time in five matches without Odegaard
Austria won their second consecutive Nations League match after a seven-game unbeaten run
Norway lost their first match in five without Odegaard
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was briefly plunged into darkness due to floodlights failing
Arnautovic was named Man of the Match
